TopicTitle: Fuel flow priority independent from other symmetry parts

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I want to change the fuel flow priority of one fuel tank independently from the other linked tanks (ignoring symmetry items).

Example in the pic below:

All 3 tanks have -11 priority. If I try to change 1 tank's priority, all other tanks change as well. I want to change the priority of only 1 tank.

Before you tell me to re-create the tanks without symmetry, in my ship (the pic below is just an example) is much more complicated and it'd take a completely rebuild..

Thanks!

You're going to have to take them off and put them back on without symmetry.

There used to be a mod called strip symmetry, but I never used it.
I edited the .craft file and it worked great!
Strip symmetry is among the functionalities of
